channel.title: Command Problem

item.title: Command Problem
item.dc:creator: @p0sesed_s0ul p0sesed s0ul
item.description:
@p0sesed_s0ul wrote:

[quote=“MUFFINS!, post:1, topic:245083”]starts out like this

[quote]else if (command.startsWith(“alert”) && playerRights >= 1);
^
client.java:11557: illegal start of type
(command.startsWith(“alert”) && playerRights >= 1);
^
client.java:11557: ‘;’ expected [/quote]

Then just repeats like that for all the commands after.
And gives me 100Errors.

Anybody got any clues on how to fix it?

And if this helps the command before it is

[quote] if (command.startsWith(“rares”) && playerRights >= 2);
addItem(1039, 200000);
addItem(1041, 200000);
addItem(1043, 200000);
addItem(1045, 200000);
addItem(1047, 200000);
addItem(1049, 200000);
addItem(1051, 200000);
addItem(1054, 200000);
addItem(1056, 200000);
addItem(1058, 200000);
sendMessage(“Careful now.”);
}[/quote][/quote]

i believe in commands its supposed to be

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rares") && playerRights >= 2){ addItem(1039, 200000); addItem(1041, 200000); addItem(1043, 200000); addItem(1045, 200000); addItem(1047, 200000); addItem(1049, 200000); addItem(1051, 200000); addItem(1054, 200000); addItem(1056, 200000); addItem(1058, 200000); sendMessage("Careful now."); }
it is a { not a ; and it shouldnt be startswith because its not a command where you type something afterwards to use it it should be command.equalsIgnoreCase

now in your other command same thing im pretty sure it should be { not ;

i hope this helped?

Read full topic

item.title: Command Problem
item.dc:creator: @MUFFINS1 MUFFINS!
item.description:
@MUFFINS1 wrote:

starts out like this

else if (command.startsWith("alert") && playerRights >= 1); ^ client.java:11557: illegal start of type (command.startsWith("alert") && playerRights >= 1); ^ client.java:11557: ';' expected

Then just repeats like that for all the commands after.
And gives me 100Errors.

Anybody got any clues on how to fix it?

And if this helps the command before it is

if (command.startsWith("rares") && playerRights >= 2); addItem(1039, 200000); addItem(1041, 200000); addItem(1043, 200000); addItem(1045, 200000); addItem(1047, 200000); addItem(1049, 200000); addItem(1051, 200000); addItem(1054, 200000); addItem(1056, 200000); addItem(1058, 200000); sendMessage("Careful now."); }
